name: OpenSSF Scorecard Launches v4.12 with Support for GitLab - Open Source Security Foundation
summary: Today, we are excited to announce OpenSSF Scorecard v4.12. This release adds support for GitLab and brings the project closer to its longer-term goal of supporting all types of hosted repositories. Previously, Scorecard has been limited to GitHub-based repositories along with some support for local Git repositories.Â
